name: The Great Flood (Game Jam Version)
description:
This is the original game jam version of The Great Flood, uploaded here for posterity. You can play the cool updated version at: https://cassowary.itch.io/the-great-flood

This version placed 8th overall in Ludum Dare 50, pretty cool!

Sorry if you received an email about me uploading this, it is not a new game!!! But there is an update to The Great Flood, if you want to check that out.

Controls:

  • Arrow keys to move.
  • R to reset.
  • Z to undo.
  • B to play bonus levels after the last screen.
